title: TIE/Shuttle MK II
wikitext:
[[File:TIE-Shuttle-MK-II.jpg|thumb|500px|right|TIE/Shuttle MK II(left)]] '''TIE Shuttle Mark II'''
'''Craft''': Sienar Fleet Systems TIE Shuttle Mark II
'''Type''': Priority personnel shuttle
'''Scale''': Starfighter
'''Length''': 7.8 meters
'''Skill''': Starfighter piloting TIE
'''Crew''': 1
'''Crew Skill''': Astrogation 3D+2, starfighter piloting 4D+1, starship gunnery 4D
'''Passengers: 1'''
'''Cargo Capacity''': 1 metric ton
'''Consumables''': 1 week
'''Cost''': Not available for sale
'''Hyperdrive Multiplier''': x4
'''Nav Computer''': Yes
'''Maneuverability''': 2D
'''Space''': 8
'''Atmosphere''': 365; 1,050 kmh
'''Hull''': 2D
'''Sensors''': *Passive: 20/0D *Scan: 40/1D *Search: 60/2D *Focus: 3/3D '''Weapons''': *Laser Cannon : Fire Arc: Front
Skill: Starship gunnery
Fire Control: 2D
Space Range: 1-3/12/25
Atmosphere Range: 100-300/1.2/2.5 km
Damage: 2D+2 '''Capsule''': This is the second model of the well-known TIE shuttle which saw action during the blockade of Hoth where it was used to quickly ferry command rank officers or other priority cargo ship-to-ship. The TIE Shuttle Mark II features a slow hyperdrive unit which makes system jumps or other hyperspace travel of short duration possible while its predecessor was only designed to travel between the ships of a particular fleet as it was not equipped with a hyperdrive. The installation of the class-4 hyperdrive unit required the reduction of the original shuttle's passenger capacity from two passenger to one.
